Room.Name: Main Courtyard Entry
Room.ShortDescription: This is the entry to the Castle Rutger's main courtyard.
Room.LongDescription: directly west is the castle's gates through a great stone archway. The main courtyard opens up to the east. Over to the north you can see a tier of seats and a group of noblemen and ladies in colorful silks. Evidently the seats are for spectators of the troop assembly which takes place twice a day. Several knights in black armor and silver helmets are already here.
